name: Hyper Slice
description:
Cut & Slice! Hack & Slash!

Cut Vegetables and Make a HUGE Sandwich!

* Fast & Fun Gameplay!
* One Click Only, Easy to Play
* Face Challenges on Every Level!
* ENDLESS GAMEPLAY!

--- MORE TO COME! ---

- Blade Skins
- FRUITS, CANDYS and MORE to SLICE!
- NEW Levels and Obstacles!
- GIFTS and MORE!

Fun Slicing game for people with perfect taste for perfect slices!
